abstract: Stocks staged a strong comeback Thursday afternoon after an initial plunge at the opening bell, as a drop in oil prices helped placate fears about problems at some of the nation’s biggest banks.
snippet: Stocks staged a strong comeback Thursday afternoon after an initial plunge at the opening bell, as a drop in oil prices helped placate fears about problems at some of the nation’s biggest banks.
lead_paragraph: Stocks staged a strong comeback Thursday afternoon after an initial plunge at the opening bell, as a drop in oil prices helped placate fears about problems at some of the nation’s biggest banks.

headline.main: Market Climbs After a Bleak Beginning
headline.print_headline: STOCKS & BONDS | Market Climbs After a Bleak Beginning
